title: Film Soceyology - January 20, 2018
googleplay:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey and fellow film critic Christopher Lloyd (The Film Yap) discuss CALL ME BY YOUR NAME, PADDINGTON 2 and PHANTOM THREAD. They talk about the video release of Chris' favorite film of 2017 plus RIDE THE HIGH COUNTRY.
